ValidationRule.description: For 'Use billing template' Billing template, Billing start and Billing End date should be required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( Opportunity.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Contract' ,IF(ISPICKVAL(ia_crm__Contract_Line_Save_Cancel_He__c, 'Use billing template'), IF(OR(ISBLANK( ia_crm__Billing_Start_Date__c), ISBLANK( ia_crm__Billing_End_Date__c), ISBLANK( ia_crm__Billing_Template__r.Name ) ), true, false),false), false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Billing Template, Billing Start Date and Billing End Date are required when Flat/Fixed amount frequency is 'Use billing template'.
